title: Radiant Diamond Kada - A Modern Classic Bangle (Gajul)
materials: High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a durable and long-lasting finish. Made with materials that meet strict standards.
features: Sleek and contemporary Kada design, featuring a delicate double-line gold plated base with strategically placed CZ stones. The openable design adds convenience and style. Has a sleek contemporary design.
description: Combines modern aesthetics with timeless elegance. The high-quality CZ stones sparkle beautifully and create a luxurious look. This Kada is lightweight and comfortable to wear daily, allowing you to enjoy a touch of luxury without any discomfort.
